Question: sin(π/10) sin(3π/10) sin(7π/10) sin(9π/10) এর মান কত?

cos(π/7) cos(2π/7) cos(4π/7) এর মান কত?
Explanation: Let θ = π/7. Using sin(8θ) = 8 sin θ cos θ cos(2θ) cos(4θ), sin(8π/7) = -sin(π/7). Thus, cos(π/7) cos(2π/7) cos(4π/7) = -sin(π/7) / (8 sin(π/7)) = -1/8
